actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain National Forest System land in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
short_title: Sangre de Cristo Wilderness Additions Act
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text:
Sangre de Cristo Wilderness Additions Act

This bill adds approximately 40,038 acres of land in the Rio Grande National Forest in Colorado to the Sangre de Cristo Wilderness.

The grazing of livestock on such land, where already established, shall be permitted to continue.
